s_dualprepareplayer--.name: A match is about to begin.

s_guilddualprepare--.name: You will be moved to the arena shortly.

s_guilddualstartcombat--.name: The battle is about to begin.

s_guildteamnotifycombat--.name: Combatants, take your place on the red carpet.\nThis match is {0} vs. {0}.

s_guildteamnotifylastcombat--.name: Combatants, take your place on the red carpet.\nThe final match will be {0} vs {0}.

s_guildteamnotifygamestart--.name: The guild battle is about to begin.

s_guildteamnotifygamestartdetail1--.name: Battles are 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, or 3 vs 3, chosen at random.\nVictory goes to the first guild to win 3 matches.

s_guildteamnotifygamestartdetail2--.name: Take your place at the red carpet to participate as a combatant.

s_guildteamnotifygamestartdetail3--.name: Combatants should go to the red carpet.\nSpectators should come down.

s_teamnotifygamedetail2--.name: Capture the flags and loot the enemy team's ship to score points.

s_teamnotifygamedetail3--.name: The team with the highest score wins.

s_teamprepare--.name: Get ready to duke it out!
